module "firewall_1"{
    network = module.network_1.network_template_ID
    name = "firewall-1"
    source = "../firewall_template"
}


module "network_1"{
    name = "network-1"
    source = "../network_template"
}


module "vm_1"{
    machineType = "${var.vm1_machineType}"
    network = module.network_1.network_template_ID
    zone = "${var.vm1_zone}"
    name = "vm-1"
    source = "../vm_template"
}


module "vm_2"{
    machineType = "${var.vm2_machineType}"
    network = module.network_1.network_template_ID
    zone = "${var.vm2_zone}"
    name = "vm-2"
    source = "../vm_template"
}
